csw:Record.dc:title: Ground Control Database - UTM zone 16
csw:Record.dc:subject: Locations: International > Outside North America
Locations: Canada
Locations: International > North America
Topic Category: Biology and Ecology
Topic Category: Oceans and Coasts
Topic Category: Transportation Networks
Topic Category: Cultural, Society and Demographic
Topic Category: Atmosphere and Climate
Topic Category: Business and Economic
Topic Category: Locations and Geodetic Networks
Topic Category: Environment and Conservation
csw:Record.dct:abstract:
A cascading Web Map Server can use other web map servers as data sources, seamlessly translating and overlaying the results into a unique map image for the user. To our knowledge CubeSERV® is the only Web Map Server capable of this feat.
What this means is that your developers will be presented with a single, uniform interface to the WMS, no matter what downstream servers are being cascaded, greatly simplfying their job. In addition, CubeSERV® will automatically supplement the capabilities of any downstream server, providing missing spatial reference systems, image formats, etc.
With this Cascading WMS Service CubeWerx is cascading the servers below.
* USGS Framework Data Web Map Service The Framework Web Feature Services are offered by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) in support of the development of the National Spatial Data Infrastructure NSDI).
* NASA JPL Global Data Server A collection of global data layers collected by various NASA satellites and projects. ...
csw:Record.dc:creator: CubeWerx Inc.

csw:Record.dct:abstract: The Canada Centre for Remote Sensing (CCRS) Web Map Service (WMS) provides an OpenGIS Consortium (OGC) compliant Web Map Service interface as an online web mapping service of various projects, such as GeoGratis, GeoBase, and other CCRS information holdings. The CCRS WMS also allows for custom cartographic styling through the OGC Styled Layer Descriptor (SLD) Specification.
csw:Record.dc:creator: NRCAN.RNCAN
